post.title: WordPress + Jamstack
post.content:
Migrating your WordPress site frontend to the Jamstack lets you keep the best parts of WordPress — the world-class content management backend — while moving your frontend development workflow to a modern stack.

WordPress + the Jamstack is a win at every part of the process, from writing, to building, to using websites.

This gives us the best of both worlds: content creators are able to work in a friendly content management system, developers are able to work with the tools and workflows they enjoy, and users get all the benefits of fast, beautiful, modern websites.
